text:
integrate HubSpot with WooCommerce, using our PREMIER integration partner of HubSpot at 30% off.
<https://makewebbetter.com/product/HubSpot-woocommerce-integration-pro/>
<https://www.HubSpot.com/integrations/makewebbetter>
Does anyone know if there are plans in HS to add more Editorial type features to the Blog Platform? Such as Editorial notes for an article and submitting for review by editorial teams?
specifically the custom statuses and notifications
<@U2H3TT8F2> I thought user limitations added this sort of feature. Approvals and such.
I dont think it adds approvals. I know it stops the user from being able to Publish the content, but I dont think the publish button swtiches to a submit for approval type button
true. It does place it into a non published state though.

Yea, the only downside is this wouldnt notify anyone so if the person writing doesnt give a heads up they are done, then its left to us to keep reaching reaching out. Figure if they had something like a "Submit for publish" that would in turn email "editors" that a blog was submitted for publish, you could streamline more.
